entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -37.5°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
